name: Natacha Tomkinson
label: Senior Software Engineer

info.label: Senior software engineer/Lead
info.brief: Full-stack software engineer specialising in cloud-driven web applications and event-driven architectures

summary:
My strong suit is JavaScript on the front and the back end (Typescript included).
I care about diversity in the workplace.
I care about code quality.
I care about delivering value to users.
I have consistently received recognition for my expertise, collaborative approach, and strong communication skills. Feedback from colleagues and stakeholders highlights my domain knowledge, my ability to effectively collaborate across teams, and my strong communication skills in conveying complex ideas clearly and concisely.

sets.name: Cloud Technologies
skills: AWS (Amplify, API Gateway, CloudFormation, Cloudwatch, DynamoDB, ECS, EventBridge, Lambdas, RDS, S3, SNS, SQS, ...)
